comment:
Module for converting an integer to a Roman numeral.
## See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roman_numerals for reference.

name: RomanNumeralDigits
description: set of all characters a Roman numeral may consist of

name: romanToDecimal
description: Converts a Roman numeral to its int representation.

name: decimalToRoman
description: Converts a number to a Roman numeral.
